text:
Hello everyone!
I am a passionate front-end developer with over 5 years of professional experience, specializing in React and HubSpot. I am actively seeking a role in HubSpot CMS development and have a deep understanding of HubSpot's key technologies and how they integrate with overall business processes. Despite my 5 years of experience, I am confident that my skills and passion will be a valuable asset to any team. I would be grateful for the opportunity to contribute. Please feel free to reach out.
<https://www.linkedin.com/in/annie-esther-wilson-063249100/>
<@U08A0QZ526B> - Thanks for sharing! Do you also help with the design process (i/e mockups, wireframes, clickable prototypes)?
<@U05R380MLMC> Yes, I create wireframes, mockups, and prototypes with Figma, collaborating closely with designers to meet both user needs and technical requirements.
